Date and Time of Meeting 2021-05-26, 6 p.m - 7 p.m. CEST / 11 a.m. - noon CDT Call to order 18:07 CEST Adjourned 19:00 CEST Role Call Directors Present Jacob Green Danese Cooper (Chair) Isabel Drost-Fromm (President) Georg Gr√ºtter (Vice President) Daniel Izquierdo Russell Rutledge (Secretary) Johannes Tigges (Assistant Secretary) Maximilian Capraro Cedric Williams (Treasurer) Directors Absent None Members Present Sebastian Spier Clare Dillon Votes Taken Danese (Cedric seconds) moves to find and promote a VP of FINOS interaction on a trial period of 6 months pending review of the results.
